an3.94:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, saradasamaye viddhe vigatavalahake deve adicco nabham abbhussakkamano sabbam akasagatam tamagatam abhivihacca bhasate ca tapate ca virocati ca.
an3.94:2.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, yato ariyasavakassa virajam vitamalam dhammacakkhum uppajjati, saha dassanuppada, bhikkhave, ariyasavakassa tini samyojanani pahiyanti—
an3.94:3.1: Athaparam dvihi dhammehi niyyati abhijjhaya ca byapadena ca.
an3.94:3.2: So vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharati.
an3.94:3.3: Tasmince, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasavako kalam kareyya, natthi tam samyojanam yena samyojanena samyutto ariyasavako puna imam lokam agaccheyya”ti.
